channel.title: SCCM Zone
channel.description: We publish awsome SCCM, SSRS and Powershell related content.

item.title: SQL Server Product and Version Reporting with SCCM
item.description: SQL licensing is always a pain but this report should make it a little easier… - This is the second iteration of my SQL version report. When I look back on my previous work I always cringe and this was no exception. A while back, I received a request to add the SQL key to the report, so I began examining the old code. Horrified by...

item.title: SCCM Application Detection Method using in Console Application Version
item.description: Say no to application version hardcoded in the detection script. - Say no to application version hardcoded in the detection script. T This method is valid for any application. In this case I will use the configuration manager client upgrade application. You might ask yourself, why not use the automatic client upgrade? Well, because the client upgrade can only run during...

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: Each post also has a subtitle - You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a...
